Text: Thanks to all the seeders out there, particularly you Poles (you know who you are).  ;)

Please seed, people!
I have to watch this movie for a presentation in school! :)
i really look forward to watching this for the first time after a long tedious download, i hope some generous hearts seed for a while after getting their jollies... (-:
The quality of the torrent is fine!
i'm really amazed, i've never seen so many good and rare movies, all toghether, in my entire life...thank you!
